thread.title_full: Our Client in Central California is seeking at Jackson & Coker (California)

title: Our Client in Central California is seeking at Jackson & Coker (California)
text: Source: MDSearch Our Client in Central California is seeking a Gastroenterologist for locum tenens coverage at their facility. Description/Requirements: Active CA Licensure Coverage Schedule: Could use full time help as soon as possible, but are extremely flexible with schedules (Could use clinic or call help, part time or full time) M-F Clinic + Call Coverage (1:4 call, weekday and weekend call available) Bread & Butter GI Procedures EUS not required, ERCPs preferred, but not huge volume and not required Approximately 4-6 procedures per unit block (typically 1/2 day in procedure room and 1/2 day covering clinic) Mostly new patients We arrange all your travel and lodging. We pay weekly during assignment. We will provide you with a Jackson & Coker Visa Credit to pay for any expenses. If you have any interest or availability for this position, please contact Jay Eley at Jackson & Coker directly at 678-277-3080 or email jeley@jacksonandcoker.com. You can fax your CV to Jay at 800-936-4562. We will never share your CV without your permission. We do pay referral fees, so if you are not available, but have a colleague that would be interested please forward this information and contact Jay Eley.
